BabyNamingTitle: What should we name our child?
Crib_Empty: Grandpa would want you to have another kid.
Crib_Empty_EnoughKids: Grandpa would say you have more than enough kids.
Adoption_Prompt: You can sign up to adopt a child here, regardless of whether you are married.

Adoption_CantAdoptYet_MaxChildren: You have more than enough kids around the house.
